title: Juventus FC - Wikipedia
snippet: On 8 August 2020, Sarri was sacked from his managerial position, one day after Juventus were eliminated from the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League by Lyon. On the same day, former player Andrea Pirlo was announced as the new coach, signing a two-year contract.

title: Thiago Motta no longer First Team coach, Igor Tudor takes over - Juventus
snippet: The club wish them the best of luck for the future. Juventus FC also announce that the Men’s First Team will now be led by Igor Tudor, who will take charge of his first training session tomorrow, Monday, 24 March.

title: Igor Tudor to remain as Juventus head coach for 2025-26 season - The Athletic
snippet: Juventus have confirmed that head coach Igor Tudor will stay with the club for the 2025-26 season.
